actions.description: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 piercing damage plus PB damage of a type determined by the drake’s Draconic Essence
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake that it can see hits with a weapon attack, the drake infuses the strike with its essence, causing the attack to deal an extra 1d6 damage of the type determined by its Draconic Essence
actions.name: Infused Strikes (Reaction)

damageImmunities: determined by the drake's Draconic Essence trait
name: Drake Companion
savingThrows: Dex +1 plus PB, Wis +2 plus PB

specialTraits.description: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake’s damage immunity, the damage of its bite, and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait
specialTraits.name: Draconic Essence
